description.value:
Elementals are immune to the following effects, unless the effect specifies that it works against elemental creatures:

  • @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.v9RNVTqyTyaPchvd]{Bleed}, critical hits, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.NV4qXRDgb7zTNkW2]{Paralysis}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.ZaS9H4rwaFIQTUBC]{Poison}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.3iTdt2NRgIyrychR]{Sleep} effects, and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.CvsDp0GvojxiF2jz]{Stunning}.

  • Flankingâ€”elementals are unflankable.

Format:Immunities elemental immunities.
